title: PHPwhileKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPwhileKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content: Example Use a while loop to print numbers from 1 to 5: "; $i++; } ?> Definition and Usage The while keyword is used to create a while loop and is also used to set the looping condition of a do...while . Related Pages The do keyword. Read more about while loops in our PHP while Loop Tutorial . Read more about do...while loops in our PHP do while Loop Tutorial . ★ +1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPwhileKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPwhileKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPwhileKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
